metadata.name: Operator Bloopers Cobalt Strike Commands
metadata.comment: Detects use of Cobalt Strike commands accidentally entered in the CMD shell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND (startswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd ')) OR startswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe')) OR startswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\cmd.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('psinject')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spawnas')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('make_token')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('remote-exec')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rev2self')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dcsync')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('logonpasswords')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('execute-assembly')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getsystem'))))

output.summary: Detects use of Cobalt Strike commands accidentally entered in the CMD shell
